title: United States API Crude Oil Stock Change
description: API Crude Oil Stock Change in the United States decreased to -6.53 BBL/1Million in October 28 from 4.52 BBL/1Million in the previous week. API Crude Oil Stock Change in the United States averaged 0.23 BBL/1Million from 2012 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 14.30 BBL/1Million in February of 2015 and a record low of -12.40 BBL/1Million in November of 2013. Stocks of crude oil refer to the weekly change of the crude oil supply situation. This page provides - United States API Crude Oil Stock Change- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: American Petroleum Institute (API)
